Articles.Content: Anyone have a auto-pilot for rendezvousing for 0.22? Rendezvousing is just a challenge and a hassle and I just want a simple and easy way for two of my pods or vessels to meet up. I really want to make a Space Station but I suck too much at rendezvousing to do so. I'm sure I'm not the only one who wants this.
MechJeb can not only do it for you, but if you pay attention, it will also show you how.
Or try my in-game rendezvous tutorial (see signature.) You might find achieving it yourself pretty fun!
I'll get MechJeb. I'll let it do it put the Station together, and then I'll try to do it myself with a two Kerbal pods.
